column2: MARYLAND DMV WRITTEN TEST
Question Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. This road sign means:
column4: All traffic must go straight ahead
column8: A road joins from the right

column2: 2. This sign indicates:
column8: Winding road

column2: 3. When using a deceleration lane to exit a roadway, drivers should:
column4: disregard the posted warning speed unless the road is slippery.
column6: not slow down until their vehicle has moved onto the deceleration lane.
column8: not use their turn signal until their vehicle has moved onto the deceleration lane.

column2: 4. This road sign means:
column8: Pedestrian crossing

column2: 5. This sign warns drivers that:
column4: the highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways. Drivers should keep to the right.
column6: there is a winding road ahead.
column8: there is a double curve ahead.

column2: 6. An edge line that angles toward the center of the road indicates that:
column8: the road is narrower ahead.

column2: 7. If your brakes are wet, you can dry them by:
column4: having them checked by a mechanic.
column8: pull over to the right and wait until it stops raining.

column2: 8. If another vehicle passes you on the left, you must:
column4: decrease your speed, then pull over to the right and stop.
column6: increase your speed slightly and keep to the right.
column8: decrease your speed slightly and keep to the right.

column2: 9. Driving at excessive speed:
column6: does not increase the chance of a crash.
column8: improves your reaction time.

column2: 10. What does the flashing signal in the picture indicate?
column4: Pedestrians should start crossing the street.
column6: Pedestrians should finish crossing the street if started.
column8: The same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 11. You can pass on the right:
column4: when a vehicle ahead makes a left turn.
column6: when a vehicle ahead makes a right turn.
column8: when a vehicle that is approaching from the opposite direction is prepared to turn left.

column2: 12. Directions given by traffic officers ___________ signs, signals or pavement markings.
column8: take precedence over

column2: 13. MVA will suspend the license of any driver who:
column4: The other answers are both correct.
column6: is determined to have a test result of 0.08 percent alcohol concentration or higher.
column8: refuses to submit to a blood alcohol test.

column2: 14. A flashing red light means:
column6: The same as a STOP sign.
column8: The light will soon change to steady red.

column2: 15. Which signs have black letters on a yellow or orange background?
column8: Railroad advance warning signs (round)

column2: 16. This road sign means:
column4: Drivers cannot make a complete turn to go in the opposite direction.
column6: Left turns are not allowed where this sign is displayed.
column8: Vehicles turning left must make a U-turn.

column2: 17. A driver cuts off another vehicle, or threatens another motorist or a pedestrian. These are examples of:
column8: excessive driving

column2: 18. This road sign means:
column8: Merge

column2: 19. If you approach a flashing red traffic light, you should treat the intersection the same as:
column8: a yield sign.

column2: 20. This road sign means:
column8: School crossing

column2: 21. The first thing affected after drinking alcohol is:
column8: judgment.

column2: 22. When driving on the freeway behind large trucks, you should:
column6: drive closer behind the truck than for a passenger vehicle.
column8: move to the right of the truck and pass it quickly.

column2: 23. More than one vehicle is approaching a four-way stop sign. Who has the right of way?
column6: The first driver to reach the intersection and stop.
column8: The last driver to reach the intersection.

column2: 24. When you make a left turn from a two-way road into a four-lane highway, you must:
column4: go straight through the intersection, and then make the turn.
column6: enter the right lane, to the left of the center line.
column8: enter the left lane, to the right of the center line.

column2: 25. The picture shows:
column8: a reversible road sign.
